title: Chickpea and Courgette Stir-Fry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', 'small handful chopped fresh oregano', 'small handful chopped fresh basil', '1 clove garlic, crushed', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 (400g) tin chickpeas, drained and rinsed', '1 large courgette, halved and sliced', '50g (2 oz) mushrooms, sliced', 'small handful chopped fresh coriander', '1 tomato, chopped']
